Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Vasostatin-1 (VS-1; N-terminal fragment of Chromogranin-A; mammals, animals)
Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the chromogranin/secretogranin protein family
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Micrococcus luteus (MIC=2 µM), Bacillus megaterium (MIC=0.2 µM).Fungi:Neurospora crassa (MIC=3 µM), Aspergillus fumigatus (MIC=5 µM), Alternaria brassicicola (MIC=3 µM), Nectria haematococca (MIC=1 µM), Fusarium culmorum (MIC=1 µM), F. oxyporum (MIC=10 µM), Saccharomyces cerevisiae (MIC=10 µM), Candida albicans (MIC=10 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Vasostatin-1 has antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria M. luteus, B. megaterium. Possesses antifungal activity against N. crassa, A. fumigatus, A. brassicicola, N. hematococca, F. culmorum and F. oxyporum and against the yeast S. cerevisiae and C. albicans.
